trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource" /> that uses a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> for content.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource" /> che usa un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> per il contenuto.

trans-unit.source: to display images that you don't have <see cref="T:System.Net.WebPermission" /> or <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> access for.
trans-unit.target: Per visualizzare le immagini che non è necessario <see cref="T:System.Net.WebPermission" /> o <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> accedere per.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage.SafeImage" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage.Drawing" /> of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> instance.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> class that has the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage.Drawing" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> con l'oggetto <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage.Drawing" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Crea un clone modificabile di questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />, eseguendo copie complete dei valori dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Durante la copia delle proprietà di dipendenza, questo metodo copia i riferimenti alle risorse e i data binding (che potrebbero non essere più risolti), ma non le animazioni né i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> dell'oggetto clonato sarà <see langword="false" />, anche se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> dell'oggetto di origine è <see langword="true." />.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Crea un clone modificabile dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />, eseguendo copie complete dei valori correnti di tale oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: I riferimenti alle risorse, i data binding e le animazioni non vengono copiati, ma vengono copiati i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> dell'oggetto clonato sarà <see langword="false" />, anche se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> dell'oggetto di origine è <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
Gets or sets the drawing content for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il contenuto di disegno per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.

trans-unit.source: The drawing content for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
The default value is **null**.

Identifier Field
Metadata Flags
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage.Drawing" /> dependency property.
Gets the height of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
The height of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
Gets the metadata of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
The metadata of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
Gets the width of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
The width of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
